alert.note: Alert for Eastern Toole and Liberty; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 5:35AM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Toole and Liberty and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind Chills as low as 20 to 35 below zero Tuesday through Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Toole and Liberty; Western and Central Chouteau County
